This soft, cushioned seat is a welcome alternative for children to use versus hard plastic ones. Also included is an easy to install, soft, contoured splash guard that redirects unwanted splashbacks that may occur during potty training.  This potty seat fits on most regular & elongated toilet seats so it is ready to use anywhere in the house.

short_description: Perfect Fit & Unshakable Stability – Engineered with 6 adjustable heights, our toddler potty training seat fits securely on both standard and elongated toilets (not compatible with square-shaped bowls). Customize the perfect height with detachable screws—inspired by Montessori principles to foster independence and build confidence. Plus, we’ve added 0.55 lbs of reinforced material for a stronger, more rigid structure that stays firmly in place

Heavy-Duty & Built to Last – Designed and patented in the U.S., this training seat supports 200+ lbs with ease. The widened base and arched support system deliver unmatched stability. Your child is safe and secure—no wobbling, no slipping, just peace of mind every time they sit down

Leak-Proof Design & Easy-Clean Comfort – We’ve redesigned the urine guard with a wider, higher splash barrier to prevent accidents and keep everything dry. Paired with a soft, replaceable PVC cushion that stays cozy in winter and cleans effortlessly. The smooth, crevice-free surface wipes clean in seconds—or remove the cushion seat and toss it in the dishwasher (top rack recommended)

2-in-1 Multi-Functional Helper – More than a potty trainer—it’s also a sturdy step stool! Kids can use it to reach the sink, wash hands, or grab books off a shelf. Lightweight, foldable, and compact, it grows with your child and stores easily between uses

Quick Setup, Less Stress – Installation is a snap. Use a coin and the included safety screws to secure the seat in under 3 minutes. We provide clear instructions and video guides so even the busiest parents can set it up quickly and confidently
